items.sentence: Tom expected Mary to show up on Saturday afternoon.
Mary advised Tom to save a little money each month.

What happened to Tom? I haven\'t seen him recently.
This tree is considered sacred by the local people.
I like both Tom and Mary, but I think Tom is nicer.
